title: If there are 88 pages in a book, how many times will you say the number 8? - Quora

response.answer_text: If the question is “how many times will you SAY the number 8?” There are 11 Eights between 1 and 88 8,18,28,38,48,58,68,78,80,88 However I’ll SAY 8 (EIGHT ), only 8 times. EIGHT Twenty EIGHT Thirty EIGHT Fourty EIGHT Fifty EIGHT Sixty EIGHT Seventy EIGHT Eighty EIGHT I dont count the “EIGHTEEN” and the “EIGHTY”
If there are 88 pages, counting the number of times ‘8’ is being written, 10 times you will see the number ‘8’. 8, 18, 28, 38, 48, 58, 68, 78, 88.
